headline: Chinese Eggplant with Garlic Sauce
name: Chinese Eggplant with Garlic Sauce
description: Chinese eggplant slices cooked with garlic, soy and oyster sauce, sugar, and chili flakes for a sweet and spicy side dish that doesn't skimp on flavor!
recipeIngredient: 4 Chinese eggplants, halved lengthwise and cut into 1 inch half moons

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large skillet over high heat. Cook and stir eggplant in hot oil until soft, about 4 minutes. Stir in water, garlic powder, and red pepper flakes. Cover and simmer until water is absorbed.
Meanwhile, mix together soy sauce, oyster sauce, sugar, and cornstarch in a small bowl until sugar and cornstarch are dissolved.
Stir sauce into eggplant until evenly coated. Continue cooking until sauce is thickened.
